programme.desc: Is the story of Carolina Astor, a resort staff who accidentally kills Joi, a resort shareholder. Carolina goes into hiding and assumes a new identity - Lorena. Lorena moves on and starts a new life but her past will haunt her.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Kaputol Ng Isang Awit
programme.desc: An unfinished song became the key, which brought together a family forced apart by the obsessive love of a young woman for a famous singer.

programme.title: Maging Akin Ka Lamang (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The rich and beautiful Rosita would do anything to win the love of the man she had become obsessed with. Still, neither her beauty nor all the money in the world gave her what she wanted.

programme.title: Papunta Ka Pa Lang, Pabalik Na Ako
programme.desc: Gaston, a veteran police officer does not want Jojo, a rookie police asset, for his daughter. Jojo proves himself and he finds a sidekick in Jojo.

programme.title: Eseng Ng Tondo
programme.desc: FPJ played Eseng 45, a Manila policeman known for his proficiency with the 45 caliber gun. He was also known to be an honest and dedicated cop, the nemesis of evil in the crime-ridden area of Tondo.

programme.title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat Ng Damortis (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Isa, Dalawa, Tatlo, Ang Tatay Kong Kalbo
programme.desc: Medel (Bembol Roco) is a pretty thief who gives his earnings to his neighbors who need it. But hid felonious activities stop when he marries Frieda (Beth Bautista) and adopts Bimbo (Nio Mulach).

programme.title: Nagalit Ang Buwan Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: A story of married couples but leaves their own spouses for their relationship.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Magmahal?
programme.desc: Jun (Nio Muhlach) feels neglected as his parents do not have time for him. He leaves home and ends up staying with Dodie (Aga Muhlach). With Dodie, Jun finds the attention and love he wants. But all ends well as it turns out that Dodie's girlfriend is Millet (Pops Fernandez) who also happens to be the niece of Josie's colleague, Ramon (Dante Rivero).

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Paikot-ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Gising Na Ang Higanteng Natutulog
programme.desc: Sgt. Delfin Guerrero (Andy Poe), an honest, kind-hearted and dedicated motorcycle cop who took on corrupt politicians in his mission to uphold the law.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the \"house-band\" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Bobby Barbers, Parak
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life exploits of Bobby Barbers, Secretary of the Department of Interior and Local Government. It chronicles his life as a young lawyer, a politician and most of all as the celebrated no-nonsense law-enforcer, who became the scourge of wrong-doers all over the country.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Takot Ka Ba Dilim?
programme.desc: The young stars of TGIS invaded the big screen in this scary, hilarious adventure where they met the monsters of Philippine folklore. The gang went off to the province for their Holy Week vacation and found themselves face to face with mythological creatures.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Do Re Mi
programme.desc: Donna, Regine and Mikee had one thing in common. They were all dreaming of success as singing stars. Duped by an illegal job recruiter, who promised them a stint in Japan, they decided to strike out on their own by putting up a restaurant where they could also perform.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger Ng Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Alyas Waway
programme.desc: Waway was the notorious mad killer who ran circles around the people of Metro Manila during the 70's. Based on real-life events and features Cesar Montanos as Waway in one of his best performances.
